# Document Information Extraction / Named Entity Recognition 

## Datasets
- https://guillaumejaume.github.io/FUNSD/
- https://www.cs.cmu.edu/~aharley/rvl-cdip/
- https://rrc.cvc.uab.es/?ch=13
- https://github.com/cneud/ocr-gt 

## Papers and Models
- [LayoutLM](https://arxiv.org/abs/1912.13318)
- 


## Blogs and Code base
- https://towardsdatascience.com/fine-tuning-transformer-model-for-invoice-recognition-1e55869336d4

- https://colab.research.google.com/github/NielsRogge/Transformers-Tutorials/blob/master/LayoutLM/Fine_tuning_LayoutLMForSequenceClassification_on_RVL_CDIP.ipynb

- https://ubiai.tools/
